column1: Table 3. Overall Survival by IO-Era Risk Group
Risk groups defined by total IO-Era Score: Favorable (0–2 points) / Intermediate (3–4 points) / Poor (≥5 points).
Median OS estimated by Kaplan-Meier method.
HRs from Cox proportional hazards regression with Favorable group as reference.
Abbreviations: OS = overall survival; HR = hazard ratio; CI = confidence interval.
